appachchige maha loku wichare.hamadamath ohomama thama.hamadama appachchila hina balanawa pahuwadata hulla hulla balan innawa.mokada appachchi aaye lankawata yana ekakya.boruwata appachchige mole amaruwata lankawe kala adala inna minissunge sanasima nathi karanna manasgatha liyanna epa.

jayanthi, aasiri, nimali wani namapuwaru sahitha welendasal ithiri weddi ginithaba thibune mohidin wani namapuwaru sahitha welenda salwalataya.

mahadana muththage katha kathawe nama -paha haya kirima mahadana muththayi eyage golayo pas denayi onna gangakin ethera wenna aawa .gangin ethera wunata passe eyalata oona wuna okkoma innawada kiyala danaganna .mokada eyalage kandayame okkoma hayak hitiya kiyala eya kalin danagena hitiya .onna mulinma ekkenek ganan karanna patan gaththa .mamayi ekayi dekayi thunayi hatharayi pahayi.mara wade ne ekkenek aduyi .hamoma ee widiyata ganan kara .ekkenek aduyi .ane ganga ape ekkenekwa bili aragena .eyala gan iwure indala andanna patan gaththa .
